snippet: W. Ralph Eubanks, the current director of publishing at the Library of Congress, succeeds Ted Genoways.
abstract: Virginia Quarterly Review names W Ralph Eubanks, director of publishing at Library of Congress, as its editor more than year after Ted Genoways resigned from the post.
lead_paragraph: W. Ralph Eubanks, the current director of publishing at the Library of Congress, succeeds Ted Genoways.

headline.main: Year After Resignation, Virginia Quarterly Review Names an Editor
